title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\EvaluationConfig\SmartReplyConfig
name: SmartReplyConfig
description:
Smart reply specific configuration for evaluation job.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.EvaluationConfig.SmartReplyConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.allowlist_document
params.description: The allowlist document resource name. Format: projects/<Project ID>/knowledgeBases/<Knowledge Base ID>/documents/<Document ID>. Only used for smart reply model.

params.name: data.max_result_count
params.description: Required. The model to be evaluated can return multiple results with confidence score on each query. These results will be sorted by the descending order of the scores and we only keep the first max_result_count results as the final results to evaluate.
